info.name: Forstok API Seller
info.description: # Overview This is the documentation of Forstok Application Programming Interface (API). This document contains the published Forstok API for sellers. General Transaction Flow: # Data Definition ## Channel List Supported channel | Channel name | Channel ID | | --- | --- | | Shopify | 2 | | Lazada | 3 | | Blanja | 5 | | Matahari mall | 6 | | Magento 1 | 7 | | Elevenia | 8 | | Blibli | 9 | | Magento 2 | 10 | | Bukalapak | 11 | | Shopee | 12 | | Zalora Indonesia | 13 | | Tokopedia | 15 | | JD Indonesia | 16 | | Zilingo | 18 | | Woocommerce | 19 | | Sales Order / Manual SO | 21 | | Grabmart | 10017 | | Tiktok | 10030 | | Aladin Mall | 3532 | ## Order Status Currently Forstok has their order status: | Status name | Description | | --- | --- | | **Pending payment** | Order is created, waiting payment from buyer. | | **Open** | Order has been paid and ready to be processed | | **Not Shipped** | Order has been processed (accepted or packed). | | **Ready to ship** | Order is ready to be picked up by courier. | | **Shipped** | Order is picked up and on delivery. | | **Delivered** | Order has been delivered to the buyer. | | **Completed** | Order finished and Marketplace payout is paid. | | **Cancelled** | Order is cancelled by buyer or seller. | ## Forstok Master Courier [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rbTrvEd2yc91EEBMz_jA4G5DDc84jZ0zcie5Hx6Sv64/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rbTrvEd2yc91EEBMz_jA4G5DDc84jZ0zcie5Hx6Sv64/edit?usp=sharing)

item.name: Authentication

query.description: Required (string). Email seller that registered as api authentication
Required (string). Account Secret key
Required (string). Account type option [channel | seller]

request.description: When using this method, the caller authenticates itself by requesting a token from Forstokâ€™s authentication API. Then the access token should be provided on every API request. JWT Authentication Flow:

query.description: Account Identifier number
Account Secret key
Account type option [ seller]

response.name: Wrong ID or Secret Key

item.description: For the API calls to be counted as a valid request, it has to provide authentication token on all API calls.

item.name: Products

query.description: Required (string). Email seller that registered as api authentication

Required (string). Used Authentication Method :
signature
jwt

request.description:
This endpoint used for creating product from seller to Forstok's Master Product(single or multi variant) with maximun product created is 50 products at one time.

NB: There are validation SKU, if SKU already exist in database the creation will not success.

> Update

| **Date** | **Update** |
| --- | --- |
| 03 November 2022 | Response Variant Error Validation (Check Example Error Validation in Variant) |

> Rate Limit

| **Timespan** | **Request** |
| --- | --- |
| 1 minute | 50 |

> Parameter request body

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | string (required) | Product name. (Max 70 characters) |
| description | string (required) | Product description. (Min 50 Characters (Recommended Min 260 Characters), Max 2000 Characters.) |
| brand_name | string (required) | Name of brand. |
| category_name | string (required) | Name of category |
| image_urls | string \[ \] | Url of images products. Image : min 3 images, max 5 images. Size : max 1mb per image, max 1200x1200px (Standard 800x800px). Recommended to use https |
| variants | object \[ \] | List of variants |
| L name | string (required) | Name of variant. (Max 15 characters) |
| L location_id | string | Location id for the variant. Location or Rack name in the warehouse. |
| L description | string | Description about the variant. (Min 50 Characters (Recommended Min 260 Characters), Max 2000 Characters.) |
| L sku_code | string (required) | A unique identifier for the product. This identifier is usually freely assigned. For SKU separator can't use space, recommended to use - |
| L barcode | string (required) | A unique identifier for the product, machine readable. |
| L price | integer (required) | Price of the Variant. (Max 100.000.000) |
| L cost_price | integer (optional) | Cost Price Item. Average Cost Price / Purchase Price |
| L weight | integer (required) | Weight of the variant. (Unit in Gram) |
| L length | integer (required) | Length of the variant. (Unit in cm) |
| L width | integer (required) | Width of the variant. (Unit in cm) |
| L height | integer (required) | Height of the variant. (Unit in cm) |
| L quantity | integer (required) | Quantity of product, default is 0. (max 999999) |
| L warehouse_code | string | Warehouse destination where the quantity will be assigned to. If null, then the quantity will be assigned to Primary Warehouse |
| L options | object \[ \] (required) | List of options type. (Only for variation purpose only) |

"items":[ 
			{

			"brand_name":"BrandZZF", // Required (string). Name of brand
			"category_name":"Clothings", // Required (string). Name of category
			"image_urls":["https://d3ndwuuxpr6t02.cloudfront.net/system/item/images/images/043/852/199/large/3fc67f6c80c4d0e8ba8e0f00c3e987a5.jpg?"], // Required (String [ ]). URL of images products
			"variants":[
				{
					"name":"Baju Doraemon Biru", //Required(
					"options": [ {"size": "XXXL"}], //Required (object[]). List of options type. (Only for variation purpose only)
					"sku_code":"baju-doraemon-xxxl", // Required (string). A unique identifier for the product. This identifier is usually freely assigned.
					"barcode":"117889", //Required (string). A unique identifier for the product, machine readable
					"description":"ini description itemnya yg size xxxl", //(string). Description about the variant. If every variant has the same description as an item, leave it blank. So it will be replaced by item description.
					"price":"285000", //Required(integer). Price of the variant
                    "cost_price":"205000",
					"quantity":"3", //Required(integer).
					"weight":"1000",//Required(integer)
					"width":"20",//Required(integer)
					"height":"30",//Required(integer)
					"length":"100"//Required(integer)

					"price":"285000",
                    "cost_price":"205000",
					"quantity":"1",
					"weight":"1000",
					"width":"20",
					"height":"30",
					"length":"100"
				}
				]
			
			}
		]
}

request.description:
**Recommended** endpoint to update qty on hand if you don't get order with pending payment status. _**Qty on Hand**_ is the physical qty in the warehouse (including Qty Reserved) ### Rate Limit | **Request / Timespan** | | --- | | 1 Request with different Payload / 10 Seconds | | 1 Payload Request Max. 100 SKUs | ### Request body parameters | Field | Type | Required | Location | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | sku | string | true | body | Sku of product variant. | | quantity_hand | integer | true | body | Update _**On Hand Qty**_ | | Sample value for final qty: 2 it will change the qty to 2. If you input delta qty just add +/- and make string type e.q : "-1", "+5" | | | | | | warehouse_code | string | false | body | Warehouse Code | | **(Optional) Single Warehouse Forstok Account**:
you can choose to use warehouse_code . If you don't use one of these, it will update to the primary warehouse

**(Required) Multi Warehouse Forstok Account**:
you can choose to use warehouse_code. | | | | |

| --- | --- | --- |
| Id | integer | variant id forstok |
| sku | string | sku product |
| quantity_onhand | integer | The number of physical items in the warehouse that are ready for sale. |
| quantity_reserved | integer | The number of unprocessed items on hold for an order. Status pending payment (unpaid) or open (needs to be processed). |
| quantity_available | integer | The remaining number of items that can be purchased on the Marketplace/webstore. (Calculated by the system automatically) |

request.description:
Use this API to get Quantity for Specific Product > Update Log | **Date** | **Update Details** | | --- | --- | | TBA | \> adding data to the response, default limit & offset.
\> change in response format for Single Warehouse and Multi Warehouse. | ### RESPONSE PARAMETERS | **Field** | **Type** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | total_sku | integer | The total number of SKU items in the profile | | next_offset | integer | The total value of offset summed with the limit (limit + offset). | | Id | integer | variant id forstok | | sku | string | sku product | | multilocation | \[ \] | All location/warehouse in the profile | | warehouse_id | integer | warehouse id in the profile (numeric) | | warehouse_code | string | warehouse code in the profile | | quantity_onhand | integer | The number of physical items in the warehouse that are ready for sale. | | quantity_reserved | integer | The number of unprocessed items on hold for an order. Status pending payment (unpaid) or open (needs to be processed). | | quantity_available | integer | The remaining number of items that can be purchased on the Marketplace/webstore. (Calculated by the system automatically) | Format Single Warehouse: ``` json { "total_sku": 1053, "next_offset": 1053, "response": [ { "id": 20477240, "sku": "CMimage1", "quantity_onhand": 0, "quantity_reserved": 0, "quantity_available": 0 } ] ``` Format Multi Warehouse / Location: ``` json { "total_sku": 6067, "next_offset": 3, "response": [ { "id": 11892701, "sku": "6SDASD0011-edited", "multilocation": [ { "warehouse_id": 701, "warehouse_code": "-", "quantity_onhand": -25, "quantity_reserved": 0, "quantity_available": -25 }, { "warehouse_id": 1160, "warehouse_code": "jkp", "quantity_onhand": 456, "quantity_reserved": 0, "quantity_available": 456 } ] } ] } ``` Note: If the user enters an offset with next_offset - 1, the response still provides next_offset data, example: ``` json { "total_sku": 1053, "next_offset": 1053, "response": [ { "id": 20477240, "sku": "CMimage1", "quantity_onhand": 0, "quantity_reserved": 0, "quantity_available": 0 } ] } ```

request.description:
Used to receive a detail of order. > Update Log | **Date** | **Update Details** | | --- | --- | | 20-7-2022 | Add `voucher_code`
and `voucher_seller` at Order level | | 04-4-2022 | Add description of `bundle_info` child variables | | 04-4-2022 | Add `subtotal`, `percent_amount`, and `fix_amount` to `item_lines` > `bundle_info` | | 11-1-2022 | Update calculation of `item_lines` _\>_ `voucher_seller` to be prorated per quantity (previously only prorated per item lines) | | 11-1-2022 | Update `item_lines` _\>_ `voucher_seller` data type to float | | 07-12-2021 | Update description for `voucher_amount` and `discount_amount` | > Response Parameters | Field | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | id | integer | ID of Forstok sales order. | | status | string | Status of order. | | channel | string | Channel name. | | local_id | string | Channel order/ Invoice ID. | | local_name | string | Order name. | | store_name | string | Store name. | | profile_id | integer | ID of Seller in Forstok system. | | _address_ | object | Order address info | | L address1 | text | Address info 1 | | L address2 | text | Address info 2 additional | | L city | string | city | | L country | string | country | | L name | string | "ship to" Customer name | | L phone | string | "ship to" Customer phone | | L postal_code | string | Postal code | | L province | string | Province | | L province_code | string | Province Code in Forstok | | L sub_disctrict | string | Kecamatan | | L district | string | Keluarahan | | L coordinate | string | Destination coordinate | | _customer_info_ | object | Customer Information | | L id | string | Id Customer in Forstok | | L name | string | Customer name | | L email | string | Customer Email | | L customer_since | datetime | Date of first purchased | | _dropshipper_info_ | object | Dropshipper information | | L id | integer | ID of Dropshipper in Forstok | | L name | string | Dropshipper name. Some channels might not provide full name of the dropshipper. | | L phone | string | Dropshipper phone number | | ordered_at | datetime | Date of order created in channel | | created_at | datetime | Date of order created in forstok | | updated_at | datetime | Date of order updated in forstok | | _item_lines_ | object array | Ordered Items Information | | L id | integer | Item lines id | | L local_id | string | item lines id from channel | | L price | integer | Item price | | L sale_price | integer | Sale price of item | | L shipping_provider | string | shipping provider name for specific item | | L shipping_provider_type | string | shipping provider type for specific item | | L tracking_number | string | Airwaybill shipping | | L sku | string | Item SKU | | L name | string | Item Name | | L variant_name | string | Variant Option Item i.e: "XL","Blue" | | L variant_id | integer | Forstok Item variant ID | | L variant_sku | string | Variant SKU | | L total_price | integer | Total Price per item lines | | L discount_amount | integer | Discount Amount per item lines | | L channel_discount_amount | integer | Rebate | | L tax_price | integer | Tax Price | | L fulfill_by_channel | boolean | Fulfill by Platform | | L voucher_amount | integer | Voucher Amount = Voucher Seller + Voucher Platform | | L voucher_seller | integer | Amount of voucher/discount borne by Seller | | L note | text | item lines info | | L serial_number | text | serial number | | L internal_note | text | item lines internal info | | L _bundle_info_ | object array | Bundle Items Information | | LL id | integer | Bundle item ID | | LL variant_id | integer | Forstok Bundle Item variant ID | | LL local_id | string | Bundle item id from channel | | LL sku | string | Bundle item SKU | | LL name | string | Bundle item name | | LL qty | integer | Bundle item quantity | | LL main_item | tiny integer | Flag if bundle item is main item | | LL item_price | integer | Bundle item price | | LL subtotal | integer | Subtotal of item bundle | | LL discount_type | string | Bundle discount type, stores value "fix" or "percent" | | LL percent_amount | integer | Bundle item discount percentage value | | LL fix_amount | integer | Bundle item discount fixed value | | _payment_ | object | Payment information | | L payment_method | string | Type of Payment Method | | L status | string | Status of Payment, contains one of the following values : \[Pending payment, Pending payment verification, Payment verified, Cancelled\]. | | shipping_price | integer | Amount of shipping. | | disc_shipping_seller | integer | Amount of discount shipping seller. | | disc_shipping_platform | integer | Amount of discount shipping platform/marketplace. | | _shipping_courier_ | object | Order shipping courier. | | L providers | string \[ \] | Available shipping providers of order. | | L delivery_type | string | Shipping courier remark (PICKUP, NON INTEGRATED, DROPOFF, etc) depends on the requested marketplace. | | L delivery_info | string | Standard shipping courier information. Note: Shopee pickup_addresses and pickup_timeslots will be exposed on this attribute as json string format if delivery type is â€œPICKUPâ€. | | L awb | string | Airwaybill/ Tracking Number | | L document_path | string | url for shipping label from forstok | | L booking_code | string | booking code ( only used by some marketplace) | | L channel_docs_path | string | url for shipping label from channel | | shipping_description | string | Order shipping description. | | subtotal | integer | Subtotal Orders | | channel_rebate | integer | Cashback from channel to seller | | cashless | boolean | true/false | | discount_amount | integer | Voucher seller OR discount amount that is not flagged by the Platform/Marketplace if borne by Platform or by Seller (e.g. Tokopedia) | | total_price | integer | Total price of order. | | voucher_code | string | Voucher code | | voucher_seller | integer | Amount of voucher/discount borne by Seller | | insurance_fee | integer | Insurance fee of order. | | discount_reason | string | Reason of discount. | | tax_price | integer | Tax price of order. | | warehouse_id | integer | Warehouse id in forstok | | cod | boolean | Flag cash on delivery(true/false) | | warehouse_code | integer | Warehouse code in forstok | | note | text | Note from buyer. | | internal_note | text | Internal Note to seller. | --- ## Order Status Currently Forstok has their order status | Status name | Description | | --- | --- | | **Pending payment** | Order is created, waiting payment from buyer. | | **Open** | Order has been paid and ready to be processed | | **Not Shipped** | Order has been processed (accepted or packed). | | **Ready to ship** | Order is ready to be picked up by courier. | | **Shipped** | Order is picked up and on delivery. | | **Delivered** | Order has been delivered to the buyer. | | **Completed** | Order finished and Marketplace payout is paid. | | **Cancelled** | Order is cancelled by buyer or seller. |

request.description:
Use this API to trigger fulfillment and update order status to Ready to Ship (RTS). **Available for all channels** > Update Log | **Date** | **Update Details** | | --- | --- | | 01-06-2023 | Update new response body :
{
"request_id": ,
"status": "",
"code": ,
"message": ""
}

"request_id" can direct to URL https://summary.forstok.com/orders?activity_id=........ | | 23-02-2022 | Update description of this API | | 23-02-2022 | Implement return marketplace error | | 23-02-2022 | Add new fields `merchant_delivery_date_start` and `merchant_delivery_date_end` | Response Code : 1. **Success** { "request_id": 42954730, "status": "Success", "code": 200, "message": "Ready to ship action is successfully requested." } 2. **Failed** 1. Export from Channel { "request_id": 42954418, "status": "Failed", "code": 500, "message": "tiktok fulfillment error: non zero code (code: 105002, message: access token is expired, please refresh it, request id: 20230519012954A40C32B06104D0137826)" } 2. Missing params or data not found { "request_id": 42954374, "status": "Failed", "code": 400, "message": "Order Not Found" } Note: 1. This API has rate limit applied. For the rate limit details please visit [Forstok - Mapping - Google Sheets](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1N38sX9c57xPJ5o_2T8Qv8cr41tuHhO_L1I2T0QHjCiI/edit#gid=107739805). 2. If there is an error returned from marketplace/channel while calling their set of RTS APIs, we will return status code 200 and response body with format `{type: "marketplace", error : "this is sample message"}`. 3. **For Set RTS Shopee** orders, we recommend that you use `pickup_address_id` and `pickup_timeslot_id`. `pickup_address_id` can be retrieved using Get Pickup Address List API and `pickup_timeslot_id` can be retrieved using Get PIckup Timeslot List. 4. **For Set RTS Blibli in case of big products**, we recommend that you fill the `tracking_company`, `tracking_number`, `merchant_delivery_date_start`, and `merchant_delivery_date_end` otherwise the order cannot be set to RTS. You can get the Big Product flag on `"shipping_provider_type": "Big Product"` from Order Details.

request.description:
Used to receive a detail of Invoice.

> Update Log 
  

| **Date** | **Update Details** |
| --- | --- |
| 01-11-2022 | Release Invoice API V1 (Beta) |

> Response Parameters 
  

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | ID of invoice. |
| profile_id | integer | ID of Seller in Forstok system. |
| channel_id | integer | ID of Channel in Forstok system. |
| store_id | string | ID of Store in Forstok system. |
| channel_name | string | Channel Name. |
| account_name | string | Account Name. |
| invoice_reference | string | Invoice Reference/Channel Order ID. |
| status | string | Status of Invoice. |
| created_at | datetime | Date of Invoice created in Forstok. |
| updated_at | datetime | Date of Invoice updated in Forstok. |
| cashless | boolean | Cashless information (True/False). |
| subtotal | integer | Subtotal Orders. |
| shipping_price | integer | Amount of shipping. |
| platform_rebate | integer | Cashback to Seller. |
| voucher_seller | integer | Vouchers made by Seller. |
| cashless_shipping_difference | integer | Shipping difference deduction based on actual weight. |
| platform_fulfilment_fee | integer | Fulfilment Fee by Platform/Channel. |
| service_fee | integer | Service fee, Platform fee, Commission, Admin fee, Program fee, etc. |
| total | integer | **Total** = Subtotal + Shipping Fee (if non-cashless) + Platform Rebate - Voucher Seller - Discount Amount. |
| balance_due | integer | Outstanding invoice amount. |
| _payments_ | object array | Payments Information. |
| L id | integer | ID of Payment Receive in Forstok system. |
| L payment_reference_id | string | Channel Settlement ID/Settlement Number. |
| L amount_received | string | Customer Email. |
| L created_at | datetime | Date of Payment created in Forstok. |
| L updated_at | datetime | Date of Payment updated in Forstok. |
| _order_ | object array | Dropshipper information. |
| L id | integer | ID of Dropshipper in Forstok. |
| L local_name | string | Order name. |
| L local_id | string | Channel order/ Invoice ID. |
| _item_lines_ | object array | Ordered Items Information. |
| LL id | integer | Item lines id. |
| LL local_id | string | item lines id from channel. |
| LL quantity | integer | Item lines quantity. |
| LL name | integer | Item Name. |
| LL sku | string | Item SKU. |
| LL variant_id | string | Forstok Item variant ID. |
| LL variant_name | string | Variant Option Item i.e: "XL","Blue". |
| LL variant_sku | string | Variant SKU. |
| LL price | string | Item price. |
| LL sale_price | string | Variant Option Item i.e: "XL","Blue" |
| LL total_price | integer | Forstok Item variant ID. |
| LL fulfill_by_channel | string | Fulfill by Platform. |
| LL _bundle_info_ | object array | Bundle Items Information. |
| LLL id | integer | Bundle item ID. |
| LLL variant_id | integer | Forstok Bundle Item variant ID. |
| LLL local_id | string | Bundle item id from channel. |
| LLL sku | string | Bundle item SKU. |
| LLL name | string | Bundle item name. |
| LLL qty | integer | Bundle item quantity. |
| LLL main_item | tiny integer | Flag if bundle item is main item. |
| LLL item_price | integer | Bundle item price. |
| LLL subtotal | integer | Subtotal of item bundle. |
| LLL discount_type | string | Bundle discount type, stores value "fix" or "percent". |
| LLL percent_amount | integer | Bundle item discount percentage value. |
| LLL fix_amount | integer | Bundle item discount fixed value. |

request.description:
Use this API to set a webhook key for security purposes on the client side. To secure our communication flow you can set the key to verify webhook request ensuring it is sent from Forstok not other malicious third party pretending to be Forstok.

This webhook security key will be sent in each webhook (all events) on the HTTP header. The key will be "key" and the value will be the key that you have set using this API.

response.name: Success Set Webhook Key

item.description:
Our Webhook Notifications allows you to listen notifications event that we provide. Weâ€™ll send a HTTP POST request to notify which webhook that you have registered to.

**Note : Use a response 200 to avoid receiving a retry**

**Webhook Retry :**

| **Retry** | **Interval** |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | 6 s |
| 2 | 21 s |
| 3 | 86 s |
| 4 | 261 s |
| 5 | 3130 s |

query.description: Required (string). Email seller that registered as api authentication
Required (Integer). A unique identifier for the webhook. You can get the id from Get List Webhooks.
Required (string). Random key identifier from seller

Required (string). Used Authentication Method :
signature
jwt

request.description:
Use this API to set a webhook key for security purposes on the client side. To secure our communication flow you can set the key to verify webhook request ensuring it is sent from Forstok not other malicious third party pretending to be Forstok.

This webhook security key will be sent in each webhook (all events) on the HTTP header. The key will be "key" and the value will be the key that you have set using this API.

response.name: Success Set Webhook Key

Our Webhook Notifications allows you to listen notifications event that we provide. Weâ€™ll send a HTTP POST request to notify which webhook that you have registered to.

**Note : Use a response 200 to avoid receiving a retry**

**Webhook Retry :**

| **Retry** | **Interval** |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | 6 s |
| 2 | 21 s |
| 3 | 86 s |
| 4 | 261 s |
| 5 | 3130 s |

request.description:
### Update AWB

This endpoint allows the user to update AWB & Tracking URL of a specific order. The request should be sent via an HTTP PATCH method to the specified URL.

#### Request Parameters

- `user_id` (path): The unique identifier of the user.
    
- `auth_type` (query parameter): The type of authentication used, in this case, JWT.
    
- `order_id` (query parameter): The identifier of the order to be updated.
    
- `awb` (query parameter): The AWB (Air Waybill) number associated with the order.
    
- `tracking_url` (query parameter): The URL for tracking the order, typically used to provide the customer with shipment tracking information.
    

#### Response

The response will include the updated details of the order after the changes have been applied.

response.name: Success Update AWB

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to update the status of an order by sending an HTTP PATCH request to the specified URL. The request should include the user ID, authentication type, order ID, status, and date as query parameters.

The response of this request is a JSON schema representing the updated order status. The schema will include the updated order details, such as order ID, status, and the date of the update.

Please note that the actual response data will be in JSON format and will adhere to the schema provided.
